law.catch_line: Funds recovered in legal action for state handled in accordance with KRS 48.005.
law.text: KRS 367.190, 367.200, 367.210, 367.220 and KRS 367.110 to 367.360 to the contrary notwithstanding, if funds of any kind or nature whatsoever are recovered by or on behalf of the Commonwealth in a legal action, including an ex rel. action in which the Attorney General has entered an appearance or is a party under statutory or common law authority, those funds recovered shall be handled in accordance with KRS 48.005.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 483, sec. 4, effective April 21, 2000.
